name: Louis MICHENS-THOMAS, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, and William F. Ward, Chairman, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Michens-Thomas v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Louis MICHENS-THOMAS, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, and William F. Ward, Chairman, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 15th day of January, 1998, the direct appeal is quashed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
706 A.2d 813
Louis MICHENS-THOMAS, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, and William F. Ward, Chairman, Appellees.
No. 055 Eastern District Appeal Docket 1997.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 15, 1998.
